description:
Keep your cranks spinning smoothly with this bottom bracket. SRAM’s DUB assemblies fit a variety of frames, no need for new bottom bracket shells.

  • Singular oversized spindle works across all bottom bracket specifications
  • Works with all SRAM DUB cranks in mountain bike 73mm bottom bracket shells
  • Gutter sealed bearings keep the elements out
  • Lighter than the GXP style bottom bracket
name: SRAM DUB PF30 68/73mm Press Fit Bottom Bracket
